tool_description: Maps menu items to their ingredient requirements and calculates total ingredient needs based on projected menu sales.

menu_items.description: List of menu items to analyze

projected_sales.description: Expected sales quantity for each menu item

waste_factor.description: Additional percentage for prep waste and spillage (0-0.3)

forecast_period_days.description: Number of days the projection covers (1-30)

error_messages: Array length mismatch: menu_items and projected_sales arrays must have the same length.
Invalid recipe scaling: recipe_scaling must be between 0.5 and 3.0.
Invalid waste factor: waste_factor must be between 0 and 0.3 (0-30%).
Invalid forecast period: forecast_period_days must be between 1 and 30 days.
Menu item not found: One or more menu_items are not in the recipe database.
Invalid sales projection: All values in projected_sales must be non-negative integers.
usage: Provide arrays of menu items and their projected sales quantities. Optionally adjust recipe scaling, waste factors, and forecast period. The tool calculates total ingredient requirements across all menu items.

total_quantities.description: Total quantity needed for each ingredient

ingredient_units.description: Units of measurement for each ingredient

top_volume_items.description: Menu items contributing most to ingredient usage

critical_ingredients.description: Ingredients used across multiple high-volume menu items
